title: Flight booking attempt: NYC to London, date conflict
user_intent: Book a round-trip flight from New York City to London for one person, departing December 20th, 2024, and returning December 27th, 2024, under $800.
what_we_did: Confirmed origin as New York City (NYC)
Identified preferred return date as December 27th, 2024
Performed initial search for specified dates and budget
what_worked: Successfully extracted origin, destination, and departure date
what_failed: Could not find suitable flights for the preferred return date (Dec 27th) within the specified budget
User expressed disappointment regarding the unavailability/high cost for Dec 27th return
next_steps: Search for flights with a slightly flexible return date (e.g., Dec 28th or 29th) to see if budget can be met
Present options that are close to the preferred return date and within budget, highlighting price differences
Ask user if they are open to adjusting their return date slightly for better pricing
instructions_for_next_model: Prioritize finding options that are as close to Dec 27th return as possible while staying under $800.
Clearly communicate any trade-offs between return date flexibility and price.
Confirm with the user if a slightly later return date is acceptable before proceeding with booking.
